channel.title: Posts on Loardforwin's Technology Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Loardforwin's Technology Blog

item.title: Myfirst
item.description: 我的第一篇博客 1.hugo new post/FileName.md 2.hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts //测试静态博客 3.cd daydream 4.hugo server -t pure –buildDrafts 5.hugo –theme=pure –baseUrl="https://loardforwin.github.io” –buildDrafts 6.cd public 7.git add . 8.git commit -m “这是我的博客” 9.cd.. 10.git remote add origin https://github.com/loardforwin/loardforwin.github.io.git 11.git push
